column3: A marvellous mural celebrating the belief of Pantheism, it was unveiled around 2015 and is a fabulous addition to the culture of Venice.Created by Levi Ponce it was commissioned by The Paradise Project who promote independent and free thinking.Vividly portraying leading lights of cultural and scientific advancement, amongst those depicted are Albert Einstein, Carl Sagan, Alan Watts and Lao Tzu.
